title: Super Galaxy Shyvana or Ice Drake?
body:
I'm torn between the two. Both have really cool particles and models, but Ice Drake is a bit monotonous, and SG colours aren't very well done imo.
Please give your opinions and reasons. Thx

replies.body: Super galaxy is way better, trust me, you will enjoy it more. Ice Drake is her worst skin IMO and it's just so clunky. Champion ship is the real blue skin to go, but super galaxy is pretty boss.
Thanks. All my friends seem to prefer Super Galaxy too.
